title: WATCH: Albino deer seen walking around front yard on family's doorbell camera
body: EATONTOWN, N.J. (SBG) — An albino deer was caught on camera walking around in the snow in the front yard of a New Jersey home. Albino sightings are very rare. According to , less than 2% of whitetail deers are albino and there's only about a 1 in 30,000 chance of spotting one in the wild.
